title: From Basic Instinct to Bridgerton, a Conversation with Costume Designer Ellen Mirojnick
itunes:title: From Basic Instinct to Bridgerton, a Conversation with Costume Designer Ellen Mirojnick
description:
What do Basic Instinct and Bridgerton have in common? Costume designer Ellen Mirojnick joins us to discuss her incredible forty plus year career in fashion, film and television.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
